alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist; Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gilchrist, Suwannee and west central Hamilton Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crossroads to near Bell. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Trenton, Bell, Suwannee River State Park, Suwannee Springs, Mcalpin, Luraville, Dowling Park, Obrien and Branford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
